title: "AI to help world’s first removal of space debris"
excerpt: "In September, the International Space Station had to dodge an unknown piece of debris. With the volume of space trash rapidly growing, the chances of a collision are increasing. The (ESA) wants to clean up some of the mess — with the help of AI."
